ui.panel.lovelace.cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.actions.action_c: Are you sure you want to run action ''{action}''?
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.actions.no_entit: No entity provided for more info dialog
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.empty_state.no_d: Ova stranica omogućava da kontrolišete svoje uređaje, međutim, izgleda da još uvek niste podesili nijedan uređaj. Idite na stranicu za integracije da biste započeli.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.iframe.error_sec: Није могуће учитати ифраме који показују на Веб локације користећи {target_protocol} ако је "ioBroker" сервиран преко {context_protocol}.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.recovery-mode.de: ioBroker ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in recovery mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.no_data: Nema podataka za prikazivanje. Novim podacima može biti potrebno do 2 sata da stignu nakon što konfigurišete kontrolnu tablu za energiju.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.solar_con: Ova kartica pokazuje koliko je solarne energije, koju ste proizveli, koristio vaš dom umesto da bude vraćen u mrežu.

Ako je ovaj broj obično veoma nizak, to ukazuje na višak solarne proizvodnje, možda bi trebalo da razmislite o punjenju kućne baterije ili električnog automobila iz solarnih panela u vreme velike solarne proizvodnje.
Ne može se izračunati samopotrošena solarna energija
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.self_suff: Ova kartica prikazuje koliko struje je potrošeno u tvom domu, a koja je došla iz lokalnih izvora (kao što su solarni paneli ili baterije).
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.grid_neut: Ova kartica ukazuje na korišćenje neto energije.
Ako je igla u ljubičastom, vratili ste više energije u mrežu nego što ste je potrošili iz nje. Ako je u plavom, potrošili ste više energije iz mreže nego što ste je vratili.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.energy_di: Идите на контролну таблу за енергију
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.carbon_co: Ova kartica pokazuje koliko struje je potrošeno u tvom domu, a koja je generisana korišćenjem alternativnih izvora poput solarnog, vetra ili nuklearnog. Što je više, to je bolje!
Consumed low-carbon electricity couldn't be calculated

ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.availa: Ovo su entiteti koje imate na raspolaganju, ali još uvek nisu na vašoj kontrolnoj tabli.
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.select: Select the entities you want to add to a card and then press the add card button.

ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_view.conve: It will create a new view using sections. This current view will stay untouched. All your cards will be imported so you can rearrange them freely.

ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_view.dense: Will try to fill gaps with sections that fit the gap. This may make section placement less predictable.

ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_view.error: You cannot save a view with the same URL as a different existing view.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_view.type_: Не можете променити свој приказ на други тип јер миграција још увек није подржана. Почните испочетка са новим приказом ако желите да користите други тип приказа.
Не можете променити свој приказ да користи тип приказа "секције" јер миграција још увек није подржана. Почните испочетка са новим приказом ако желите да експериментишете са приказом "секције".

ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.par: This dashboard is currently being maintained by ioBroker. It is automatically updated when new entities or dashboard components become available. If you take control, this dashboard will no longer be automatically updated. You can always create a new dashboard in configuration to play around with.
DA lis te sigurni da želite da preuzmete kontrolu nad korisničkim interfejsom?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.yam: You are using YAML mode for this dashboard, which means you cannot change your dashboard config from the UI. If you want to manage this dashboard from the UI, remove 'mode: yaml' from your dashboard configuration in 'configuration.yaml.'.
To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_no: Ovaj element nema ID. Dodajte ID ovom elementu u 'ui-dashboard.yaml'.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_mi: ioBroker can add IDs to all your cards and views automatically for you by pressing the 'Migrate configuration' button.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.condition-edito: The card will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled.
The condition can not be tested because the configuration is not valid.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.alarm-pane: The Alarm panel card allows you to arm and disarm your alarm control panel integrations.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.area.name: Oblast
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.area.descr: Картица "Област" аутоматски приказује ентитете одређене области.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.area.show_: Prikaži snimak fotoaparata umesto slike oblasti
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.calendar.d: The Calendar card displays a calendar including day, week, and list views
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.conditiona: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.d: The Entities card is the most common type of card. It groups items together into lists.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.e: View the details of this row by pressing the edit button
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity.des: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity's state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.des: The Button card allows you to add buttons to perform tasks.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.def: The default depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info dialog will be shown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity-fil: The Entity filter card allows you to define a list of entities that you want to track only when in a certain state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.name: Merač
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.desc: The Gauge card is a basic card that allows visually seeing sensor data.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.glance.des: The Glance card is useful to group multiple sensors in a compact overview.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.name: Mreža
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.descr: Mrežna kartica vam omogućava da prikažete više kartica u koordinatnoj mreži.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.title: Title
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.logbook.de: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.history-gr: The History graph card allows you to display a graph for each of the entities listed.
Extend Y axis limits to fit data
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.statistics: Kartica Statistički grafikon vam omogućava da prikažete grafikon statistike za svaki od navedenih entiteta.
Extend Y axis limits to fit data
Statistička kartica vam omogućava da prikažete statističku vrednost entiteta određenog perioda.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.horizontal: The Horizontal stack card allows you to stack together multiple cards, so they always sit next to each other in the space of one column.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.humidifier: The Humidifier card gives control of a humidifier entity for humidifying or dehumidifying, allowing you to set its mode and desired humidity.
Show current humidity as primary information
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.iframe.des: The Webpage card allows you to embed your favorite webpage right into ioBroker.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.name: Svetlo
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.desc: The Light card allows you to change the brightness of the light.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.generic.ma: Želite li da dodate prilagođenu karticu ili samo želite ručno da napišete YAML?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.generic.pa: Paste a {type} card from the clipboard
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.heading.de: The heading card structures your dashboard by providing title, icon and navigation.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.heading.en: Neaktivno stanje (npr. isključeno, zatvoreno) neće biti obojeno.
Vidljivo ako je izabrano u sadržaju stanja
The entity will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled. If no conditions are set, the entity will always be shown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.name: Mapa
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.descri: The Map card that allows you to display entities on a map.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.markdown.d: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.clock.name: Časovnik
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.clock.desc: Kartica časovnika prikazuje trenutno vreme koristeći Vašu željenu veličinu i format
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.media-cont: The Media control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture.de: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to perform an action.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-el: The Picture elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even actions! On an image based on coordinates.
Are you sure you want to delete the {type} element?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-en: The Picture entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-gl: The Picture glance card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to perform an action.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.plant-stat: The Plant status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.sensor.des: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.
The To-do list card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and remove items from your to-do list.
This card requires the `todo` integration to be set up.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.thermostat: The Thermostat card gives control of a climate entity for heating or cooling, allowing you to set its mode and desired temperature.
Show current temperature as primary information
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.name: Pločica
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.descr: The tile card gives you a quick overview of your entity. The card allows you to toggle the entity, show the More info dialog or trigger custom actions.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.color: Neaktivno stanje (npr. isključeno, zatvoreno) neće biti obojeno.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.icon_: Ponašanje kod duplog klika na ikonu
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.featu: Always displayed at the bottom if the content layout is vertical
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.vertical-s: The Vertical stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.weather-fo: The Weather forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.
Prikaži trenutnu vremensku prognozu i prognozu
Maximum number of forecast elements to show
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.badge.entity.de: The Entity badge gives you a quick overview of your entity.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.badge.entity.co: Neaktivno stanje (npr. isključeno, zatvoreno) neće biti obojeno.
